Projects

We love new projects, get in touch and tell us what you're thinking, we'd love to help make it happen.

Brighton Bazaar

A website and admin tool to take the stress out of managing Housing Coops. Check out the app but drop us a line first for a log in. The code for this Open Source project is available on GitHub. We're always up for writing new features and customzing to your needs, just let us know what you need.

Housing-Coop

A website and admin tool to take the stress out of managing Housing Coops. Check out the app but drop us a line first for a log in. The code for this Open Source project is available on GitHub. We're always up for writing new features and customzing to your needs, just let us know what you need.

Banco

A bank statement analyizer run from the command line or bundled into your rails app. Banco imports a .CSV file and outputs a summary of the transactions in an easy to understand format. Written in Ruby with no third party dependencies. Available as a gem or you can clone the code. Open Source and free to use.

develop and grow with s33d
